page.title: 13Our Police 2
page.content:
There are two vehicles a patrol car and a landrover which is very important to have because it is a tough vehicle.In the back of the landrover are shovels,jackets,food rations,first aid box,blankets,safety lines,road signs,tow ropes and a firemans axe.In Inveraray there are two constables and one sergeant,also two special constables. The two special constables live locally and they help by going with the policeman when extra help is needed.Nearly everybody in Cairndow trusts the police and the police trust them and that helps a lot,what our constable calls "good police public relations".
**********
